website_summaries.verdict: These under-eye masks contain 24k gold and collagen, which help to moisturize and hydrate your skin.
pros: This best-selling eye treatment contains 24k gold, which is an ingredient used in many luxury spas
The masks assist in blood circulation while also expelling harmful toxins from underneath your eyes
Help fight wrinkles, bags, and dark circles under your eyes
cons: Some have said they don't stay in place

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is my before and after with only ONE USE! I also used the rose quartz roller and Olay regeneris cream. I defiantly notice a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Revblank

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: When you put it on, it has an amazing cooling effect on the eyes and makes me feel really relaxed and as soon as you take it off, you can instantly see the results! You can see more bright, clear skin under my eyes and last for the day and sometimes longer depending on how tired I am that week. Before using this product, I had really dark circles but after using it, I can clearly see a difference and it's dark as it used to be which means that it has a long-lasting effect as well. It's an A+ product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: If I've had a night where I didn't sleep well, I usually have bags under my eyes. This is when I'll use Lapure eye treatment mask. I keep it in the fridge so it's nice and cold. It's refreshing and I definitely see a difference after using.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product that really works!!
customer_reviews.text: These eye masks are absolutely amazing!! I like to leave them in the refrigerator for about 30-45 minutes before applying them. The cold mask feels so good to put under my eyes, it’s a very calming feeling. I use them at night to unwind from the day and give my tired eyes some much needed TLC. Besides feeling great, these masks work like a charm! Honestly, after removing them my fine lines and wrinkles around my eyes have all but disappeared and my skin feels refreshed and dewy! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye sunken eyes and dark circles!
customer_reviews.text: These top patchology and even a $200 pair I tried from Chantecaille. I cant believe they are this effective and this cheap. The size are perfect and they are slightly indented on one side so they suction right to your under eye. Nothing ever helps my dark circles but these were amazing in just one session with no eye cream is the photo attached. The plumping effect it gave was amazing under eyes were brighter and more hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several eye mask treatments, and this is by far the best one I’ve ever used! You can feel it working from the minute you put the patches on, especially if you refrigerate them for an hour before use. So sad to see they are no longer available on Amazon.com! Will definitely be trying the “luxury collagen eye masks” and hope for similar results.
customer_reviews.author: John's orders

customer_reviews.title: Love love love, great for headaches too!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these! I originally bought them for myself and bridesmaids when we were getting ready for our wedding. But loved them so much that I have even mailed them to my husband to use while on deployment. I also get migraines and the cooling effect is extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, moisturizing, skin Plumping
customer_reviews.text: Feels very nourishing on my skin and helps plump the hollows under my eyes. I wear them in the mornings for about 30 minutes while I do my yoga routine
customer_reviews.author: Chandhi Black

customer_reviews.title: I love these eye masks!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the eye masks! Such a nice treat after a long day of work. I put them in the fridge as was recommended and it feels incredible! My fiancé loves them too! He's an essential worker so his under eye area is getting irritated from wearing a mask all day. So we have both been using them. So far it's working really well my skin feels soft and smooth and it seems to be brightening my under eye area! Will definitely be getting more When this box runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Put them in the fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Put them in the refrigerator and they feel so good in the morning or after a night out. Cooling, feels good and makes me feel less puffy
customer_reviews.author: lrh5081

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced little pieces of heaven
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful gifts to give yourself. Easy to use, moisturizing and allows you that 15 minutes every woman deserves to calm yourself, close your eyes and pamper yourself. Reasonably priced little piece of heaven.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Calling all teachers:
customer_reviews.text: I blame genetics for giving me deep-set eyes and teaching middle school for exacerbating my undereye circles. I have used these masks as a pick-me-up after a particularly long day and have noticed that it does help me look more rejuvenated after application. These are kept in my fridge to feel more refreshing and I leave them on until the mask shrivels up a bit. Because I have not used these consistently or on a regular basis, I cannot speak to the longterm benefits. However, I will be purchasing again and plan to use them much more frequently since the start of virtual teaching has left me WORN OUT!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Newton

customer_reviews.title: This eye masks is made in China
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money for this! I'm so disappointed... tried on and did nothing for me!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Given as Bday present now hooked
customer_reviews.text: Im 50. I always wake at 430am with very puffy bloated eyes. I use the product as instructed for 30 mins every morning as i read or do work with my coffee. After 30 mins I take them off and the puffy is almost completely eliminated by at least 90%. I mean basically its perfect. My skin feels soft and its ss if they were given a lotion bath without the greasy lotion feel. I love it and am definitely going to keep using!!! This is no joke. Oh and im a guy not a woman. I didn’t think this was legit and now im hooked
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had dark circles and eyebags from working as a nightshift nurse and have tried expensive and high end eye creams. I tried putting ice, even sliced some cucumbers, tomatoes and whatever my family and friends recommended to get my puffy eyes and my eyebags look better. This product is good in a way that you can put it anytime under your eyes anytime and stays there and you can do any activities and household chores you need to do. No need to lie down unlike those ice and cucumbers that you need to hold under your eyes. Very convenient and easy to use especially for busy, working mothers like me.
customer_reviews.author: NAOMI GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: These Eye Treatment Mask Gels don't do anything.
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I tried these 3 times and were never satisfied. We tried at night and in the morning, Our eyes did not look less puffy, nor did they feel more moisturized. I returned them as defective because the product did NOT live up to the claims.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good but could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: I use these for eye hollows from lack of sleep and allergies. This product soothes these areas. Some of packets have little moisture so it doesn't stick on as much. The ones that are moist have more effect. I wish there are simple instructions telling users which way these masks go on the eye. Sometimes I have put them on backwards. I have had a good experience overall.
customer_reviews.author: Average Customer

customer_reviews.title: PUT IT INSIDE YOUR FRIDGE LADIES FOR GREAT RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SO MUCH! WORTH IT, PUT INSIDE FRIDGE AND USE IT. IT GIVES A NICE COOLING EFFECT UNDER THE EYES. NOT THE FREEZER THE FRIDGE. REDUCES PUFFY EYES. I ALSO PUT MY JADE ROLLER IN THE FRIDGE AS WELL! I WILL BE PURCHASING MORE AS LONG AS THEY DON'T BE RAISING THE PRICE ON THESE :-) MUCH LOVE <3 FOLLOW ME @JESSJESSBOBESS7
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Work very well for puffiness and bags.
customer_reviews.text: These have worked well for me so far. The only thing I was slightly confused about was whether or not they had a front and a back side, so I could know for sure which side was best to apply to my skin. I'm assuming now that it makes no difference, but it would be good for the manufacturer to also point this out for the customer to avoid confusion. Otherwise, I am very pleased with this product. Great quality and results!
customer_reviews.author: EJB75

customer_reviews.title: Dark circles vanished!
customer_reviews.text: I had really dark circles and on the recommendation of a friend, I ordered the La Pure 24K gold eye treatment mask. These slide on easily and stay put-I can walk around with them on but choose to treat myself to lounging time. From the first treatment, my circles lightened plus my eyes are brighter! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Risa Schiff

customer_reviews.title: Give It a Try
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today and it went on with little to no trouble. There was a tingling feeling the whole time I had it on - and almost like a peppermint feeling on my skin. It definitely moisturizes my skin as well. It's a little too soon to say if it actually helps with bags however but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have found that the pure 24K gold eye treatment masks work really well. My eyes tend to get puffy and when I use these under eye masks I can tell the difference almost immediately. The puffiness goes down and my eyes look more awake. I am so happy with this product that I have recommended to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: LolaNicole

customer_reviews.title: Gave me hives
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these but unfortunately they seem to give me an allergic reaction. I got hives on my cheekbones from these and I don't usually have a sensitive skin or get a reaction from beauty products. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and Rejuvenating.
customer_reviews.text: Soothing and effective. Reduces puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines. Makes me look well rested. My 44-year-old eyes don't give away my age or fatigue when I use these. Once or twice a week seems to keep the delicate skin around my eyes in healthy condition for several days at a time. I keep coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Norton

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC EYE PATCHES!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s AMAZING!! It perfectly moisturizes my under eye skin and leaves my eyes looking refreshed and not so haggard. It also smooths out the fine lines which allow makeup to go on nicer. I want to order more but product on Amazon is currently unavailable. Please send them more.
customer_reviews.author: Yancy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. It’s a great treat. Very soothing and feels great. Calming and refreshing. Definitely worth it. Hadn’t tried them before and now I love them. My step daughter and I use them as part of a mini spa day. It’s always a great experience. Found them on amazon when I was wanting a little tlc for my tired eyes while working a lot. We put ours in the fridge. The coolness on your face is a great part of the refreshing experience. Like little eye pillows of coolness and softness. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia G.

customer_reviews.title: Soothing, makes skin soft and dark circles less visible
customer_reviews.text: I genetically have very dark undereye circles and thin skin under my eyes. I look less tired since I started using the product about 3 months ago. I love how gentle the eye mask feels, there is no irritation and my skin feels very soft after application.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: It works :-)
customer_reviews.text: I amusing these eye masks for the first time. I received them on 7th July & immediately used them the same day. I've small dark patches right below my dark circles. These are particularly difficult to get rid of. But after using these eye masks for the first time itself, I could see that they had considerably lightened. And I've been using these every two days since then & the improvement is remarkable. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok Patil

customer_reviews.title: Added to Auto-Ship!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not expect these to work as well as they do. I thought it would be a fun thing to try for a girls night, but I was blown away by the fact that I could actually see a before/after difference! My under eye looked smoother and brighter. They're easy to wear and don't move around or fall off as I work around the house. I've stored a couple packs in the fridge for a little extra refreshing
customer_reviews.author: JoneL

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my under eyes feel after using these eye masks. I feel refreshed. I do not have under eye puffiness but am older and just overall my eyes feel awake! This is the second time I ordered these. For the price i feel these are great!
customer_reviews.author: martha hengels

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have occasional bags under my eyes and I hate the way it makes me look. This product cools under my eyes, reduces my bags, feels great and I think it makes me look younger!! Fast shipping time was also a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia L. Brazile

customer_reviews.title: Relieves my tired eyes. Hydrates reducing fine lines and dark circles!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these eye masks. I am a nurse and work 12 hr shifts. Needless to say my eyes can begin to look tired, dehydrated and with dark circles . I am 44 and love the way these eye pads feel. I keep in fridge for added comfort, when I take off the dehydration is visibly improved and the dark circles are faded greatly. Love using that’s on my facial night and after working my shift. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rockenbach

customer_reviews.title: Can cause allergy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has a very bad quality! I don’t know what chemical additives it contains, but they have caused a rash and irritation on my face. I don’t recommend ordering these crummy patches.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I first started using the pure gold under eye masks in February of 2018 and Love love them! I have reordered them over and over and have given them as gifts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Smoother skin under the eye
customer_reviews.text: The eye mask really hydrated the skin under the eye area. After the mask, there's a visible difference between the skin that just was treated and the skin that wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Celebrate Woman Today

customer_reviews.title: Immediate results
customer_reviews.text: Placing the product under my eyes immediately has me feeling refreshed and ready to relax. After leaving on my eye are looks and feels brighter and more awake. The Pure eye treatment mask leaves me feeling refreshed every time I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin M.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t got any of the expected results after applying these eye masks. They turned out to be a trash stuff. The patches don’t reduce puffiness and dark circles. I’ve just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: Felt soothing when applied, but I ultimately noticed no difference with the bags under my eyes : (
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Red bags under eyes no
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the red bag I have under my eyes I use it for about an hour and see improvement the Moore you use it the better the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Darling

customer_reviews.title: Bought these pre-wedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pre wedding for me and all my bridesmaids. Seemed to be able to tell a difference and loved using them while we were getting ready!
customer_reviews.author: StormCrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! Especially when I put them in the refrigerator and apply them atop a caffeine serum. They're perfect! Nice little luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have dark under eye circles that I have to cover up every morning. I put the eye masks in the refrigerate overnight and wear them as I’m getting ready in the morning a few days a week. It is so refreshing! I find that the days I use them, I barely have to wear any make up and it gives my under eyes a nice fresh, glossy look. I am very happy with this product and am a frequent buyer! They do tend to slide down as you are moving around/getting ready.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful product...
customer_reviews.text: I love the cool feeling effect they leave under my eyes. It actually helps my headaches after a long stressful day. My eyes look so much better. Not tired looking. The puffiness under my eyes are disappearing. I will continue to purchase this product. I highly recommend this to my friends, or anyone that needs help with with the puffiness and small wrinkles around your eyes. I love this product! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DON JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: LUXURIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pure luxury! Not only does it work but it feels great while using it! I recommend this and it is a great gift idea as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cade Bittner

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love putting these in the fridge and then using them in the morning before an event. Refreshing, cool, and leaves my under eyes moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Fox

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and rejuvenating!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! As a nurse that works the night shift, this product has been a lifesaver. I used to have dark, baggy circles under my eyes and this product has left me looking rejuvenated. Friends have complimented how the skin around and under my eyes appears smooth, hydrated, and less puffy. The product itself also feels refreshing. I'm a fan of this product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a godsend! Like most people, I have puffiness and wrinkles around the eyes that is especially noticeable when smiling-which makes me apprehensive to do so. After the first use, I noticed a dramatic improvement in the puffiness AND wrinkles! Additionally, the gels are very cool and soothing to the eye area and skin. I would recommend to anyone who wants a more confident smile without worrying about puffiness or wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: Definitely removed dark circles and discoloration. Brought some brightness back to my face. Probably have to use it more to help reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Tucker

customer_reviews.title: refund
customer_reviews.text: They caused a burn under both of my eyes within just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kameelah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes skin feel lighter and I feel less tired, best experience is keeping the product in the freezer and I do see the changes after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: Val J.

customer_reviews.title: Works and is simple
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been struggling to get a lot of sleep due to my work hours. Found this product on amazon and it’s amazing within five or take 3-6 days I started to see my raccoon eye fade and lighten up. If you looking for something to help dark circle under your eyes please try this you won’t regret it just make sure to follow instructions which are simple and you’ll love it the end results.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Valera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eye patch
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and will be purchasing again.. it definitely helps with my dark circles and puffiness around the eyes
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This product came immediately and was useful for the very start. It has made a big difference in my under eye bags- both immediately and also for multiple days following use. The pads stayed on my eyes easily while I was up and moving around without difficulty. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M. Alvela

customer_reviews.title: Brightens my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for a while now. It decreases puffiness and dark circles in the AM and hydrate's my skin. I put them in the refrigerator which feels so great on my skin. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love using these in the morning on the weekends before makeup. They really help decrease dark circles and puffiness. I used them the morning of my wedding. I wish I had been putting them in the refrigerator from the beginning. They feel amazing and work even better. You can use either side of the patch. My favorite eye mask purchase yet. Will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Delany

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for the tired under eye baggage I’ve been carrying around lately-this is IT! I read the reviews, saw some pics, and was sold! Do yourself a favor-put them in the fridge. Trust me-it feels SO good! This really helped wake my face up! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Brightening and soothing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I keep them in the refrigerator and use every morning to wake up my puffy eyes! Brightening and hydrating!
customer_reviews.author: jasgriffin

customer_reviews.title: Red skin
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this product. These patches seem to have caused allergy. The skin under my eyes has become red and irritated.
customer_reviews.author: JJud

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing ever takes away my under eye bags and then I try this. It is legit the most amazing product that I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Highly recommend!! it has greatly improved the puffiness and dark circles under my eye, fine lines have also cleared. The mask feels so cool and refreshing under my eye especially if you put the mask in the refrigerator before using. It also perfectly moisturizes my under eye skin making my makeup go on smoothly in the morning. Will be using this product again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: Literally stunned at these results. My under eye area was looking pretty bad from years of packing on concealer to hide my dark circles. Decided to try these for a self esteem boost thinking at the least they would just be a nice cooling treat. But OMG, after one use my under eye skin is plump, bright, and moisturized! Will definitely be repurchasing when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new mom and have bags under my eyes and dark circles. These eye masks helped de puff and lessen the dark circles. I placed them in the refrigerator before I used for an even more relaxing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Giggs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for allergy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I tried these out. I’ve never really tried anything like this but I have pretty bad allergies and my eyes get puffy and I get slight dark circles. I wanted to see if something like this could help. I put them in the refrigerator for an hour and used them after having allergy eyes. They worked great! The dark areas went away for me. I’ll definitely be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: witherblisterburn

customer_reviews.title: I hoped for more....
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to use and I like putting them on after being in the refrigerator, but they did nothing for my dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Nakisha T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Has helped with puffiness and appearance of tired eyes! Also helps me get awake for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Garner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been very stressed and finally noticed the effect it was having on the bags under my eyes so I tried your product after reading reviews online. I do think there has been some improvement, of course I had hoped for immediate and dramatic transformation, but I've also only used them 7 times so far so I'm still very hopeful that I will continue to see more improvement.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Im not seeing a huge difference in the puffiness under my eyes. I have bought 2 packages and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: After 1 use I noticed my eyes feel less stressed out and tired. It felt soothing. After about 3 uses along with eye cream I’m beginning to notice a lift in the bags and puffiness in my under eye area. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I like this mask specifically bc of the size and the stickiness. It doesn’t fall off like other masks do with movement or slide down your face. They are also small so if I feel like they aren’t all soaked into my skin yet I’ll put on sunglasses that hide them and go ahead to my errands. They don’t dry fast either I feel like my skin gets so much moisture without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh look
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. I put it in my fridge to it is nice and fresh before I apply it. I just do put on once a day or if needed. Like after night shift before I went to bed because it just feels so good. It helped my dark circle. Didn't removed it all the way but I look way better and fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love how cool and refreshing it feels when I put it on -- it's like a mini spa treatment at home. Second, unlike other brands, the pads actually stay on without sliding around once I apply them. Third, the refreshing feeling continues even after I remove the pads. Fourth, the pads actually do what they are intended to do -- they reduce under-eye puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Bryan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great for both under-eye bags and puffiness. You can see the difference after just one use. I use them every 3-4 days. My only caveat is that they sometimes slide down your face, especially if you recently moisturized or have oily skin. For this reason it's best to use them when you are sitting or laying down. Pop them in the fridge for an extra soothing feel!
customer_reviews.author: Pachita

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of months and I love it. I throw them in the fridge for 15 minutes and then put them on while I drink my coffee. My black circles and puffiness is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Add the Fridge for an Extra Boost!
customer_reviews.text: I normally use these before going into meetings, and I love them. I put them in the refrigerator for about ten minutes prior to use, to get an extra boost! The product isn't slimy like other eye treatment masks, and doesn't slide down when applied. I will always recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I saw a difference the first day!!! It visibly reduced that "tired look" I'm so pleased , don't question go ahead and buy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: it is ok
customer_reviews.text: it smoothes the wrinkles around my eyes. I find out 15 minutes is the best time for keeping that under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: roya

customer_reviews.title: Poof Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: It really helps with eye puffiness due to allergies! I’ve had them and used them for months!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I love putting these on in the mornings when my eyes feel extremely tired and kind of hurt from not getting a good nights sleep. They are so soothing and feel so good. I immediately looked refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Imamura

customer_reviews.title: My skin is red and itchy
customer_reviews.text: After 2 applications the skin under my eyes has become red and irritated. I think I’m allergic to some components of these patches. Now I need to soothe the inflammation somehow. I will never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: DixXxy

customer_reviews.title: Redness and irritation
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with these patches! The may cause allergy and bad skin reaction. My friend turned out to be allergic to the ingredients of the patches. Now she has a severe rash under her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Saunleo

customer_reviews.title: Highly moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best under eye mask treatments I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product, It moisture the eyes and leave them refresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This mask treatment is great. I have allergies that cause my eyes to be puffy underneath throughout the year. I wear these masks for about 30 minutes while I'm getting ready in the morning, and the puffiness is gone by the time I'm done. Also, I have found that you can use them twice if you put them back in the individual packet and stick them in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paulus

customer_reviews.title: Might cause serious skin reactions
customer_reviews.text: These patches are not quite safe. I happened to have allergic skin reaction just after applying them. It took me some time to return my skin back to normal. I’d like to warn everybody about possible side effects!
customer_reviews.author: Bimann

customer_reviews.title: Allergenic product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff causes skin irritation and itching! And it not a laughing matter! I know 2 people who turned out to be allergic to these patches. Their skin was fairly inflamed. This product can seriously damage the under-eye skin.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: I woke up with skin inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I applied the patches yesterday. And this morning I woke up with an intense inflammation under my eyes. I have a very uncomfortable itching sensation. I’m not gonna use them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: My experience with LA PURE 24K Gold Eye Treatment Masks
customer_reviews.text: It leaves my under eye skin smooth while minimizing the appearance of wrinkles. I use it every night and sometimes during the day while I relax at home.
customer_reviews.author: Karley Kinmonth

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I feel it really refreshes my under eyes and reduces any inflammation. The product itself is good quality, it's never breaking, it's hydrating and delicate. I have been recommending it to all my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: So-so on the depuffing, but feel great and are hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest de-puffer, if that's what you're looking for. However, they feel cooling and are very hydrating
customer_reviews.author: Carla Borderies

customer_reviews.title: Full disclosure: I'm writing this review for another free set, but I do really like them!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these eye masks! I kept them in the fridge and used them for 15 minutes in the morning before work. It helped decrease puffiness and made me feel more refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Results in 5 days for me
customer_reviews.text: It reduced my bags within 5 days. Works great, especially when refrigerated. I’m glad that I bought these and wouldn’t mind telling other people about this product as well
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: No effect and skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to eliminate my dark under-eye circles and bags. And what now? The patches haven’t improved my skin condition but have only caused irritation that is similar to allergy. It’s a fake and chintzy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Hobip

customer_reviews.title: Great for those sleepy days
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been sleeping well lately, and these have really helped on the days I need a little get-up and go. I followed other reviewers' suggestions and put them in the fridge before applying, and they feel great. Definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Purnell

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating and less fine lines !
customer_reviews.text: I started noticing fine lines around my eye area, I’m now in my mid 30s, and these eye masks have dramatically reduced them. I noticed smoother skin around my eyes after just one use and less fine lines after continued use. They stay on well and feel luxurious or my tired eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works best if you do it before your day instead of before you go to bed. Noticeable that it works ! It does slide down instead of stick to your eyes so you have to lay down while you have it on. Once you use it it is noticeable that the eye bags go down.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but burned my sensitive under eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Spetla

customer_reviews.title: Eye mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it helped with my puffy eyes. I suffer from dark spots under my eyes and my eyes being puffy through the day. Using the product after putting it in the refrigerator worked best.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, do you have dark circles, puffy eye, and crows then try this product you will be amazed. It like a spa in your house. After just 1 use you will see a difference! After 2 weeks WOW and now even my husband wants to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy's Posse

customer_reviews.title: Rash
customer_reviews.text: It’s a disaster! There is a severe rash under my eyes. The only reason for it is this trashy product. I hope the rash will go away soon. But I will never apply these patches again.
customer_reviews.author: Coold

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Treatment Masks
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple of eye treatment masks before but none have been as good as these La Pure Gold. They feel so cool and refreshing (I often don't want to take them off) and take care of puffiness quickly! You will love these. I have my mom hooked on them too!
customer_reviews.author: Jenise Ruehle

product_meta.title: LA PURE 24K Gold Eye Treatment Masks - Under Eye Patches, Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment, Under Eye Bags Treatment, Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes, Anti-Wrinkle, Undereye Dark Circles, Gel Pads 15 Pairs
feature_bullets: ★ POWER OF 24K PURE GOLD: 24k gold is widely used as a luxury and prestigious skin treatment ingredient in top spas all over the world. The active 24k gold has the ability to expel harmful toxins and significantly hydrate your skin, increasing blood circulation, improving cellular metabolism, thus reduce wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness around your eyes, and add shine to dull skin.

★ COLLAGEN: Stimulates and regenerates skin cells, dramatically elevate your own skins collagen growing ability. This will restore elasticity and firmness to your skin, and reduce wrinkles, puffy eyes, finelines, crows feet and the appearance of bags and dark circles under your eyes.

★ HYALURONIC ACID: Known for its profound hydration function. Hyaluronic acid provides instant and long-lasting hydration to the skin around your eyes. LA PURE New Zealand has sourced and added top range Hyaluronic Acid solution into the formula.

★ GRAPE SEED EXTRACT: Grape seed extract is considered to be one of the most effective natural skin care ingredients available. It has 50 times more antioxidant power than the well known Vitamin E. So take advantage today! Buy our eye treatment patches risk free and get to work on them puffy eyes! Our eye masks will help reduce puffy eyes, help remove bag under eyes, and help soothe your under eye area, making them the perfect eye pads for wrinkles & puffy eyes!
